name: ROC CHOIJIN
main_text: Our ROC Choijin branch is located at the heart of the business district in Ulaanbaatar and is able to cater to both sit-in or take-away for our customers. This branch provides for a comfortable and convenient location for any occasion. Although smaller than the others, it has sufficient seating both indoors and outdoors on the terrace.
address: Address:   R.O.C. Choijin, 1st Floor, Choijin Suites, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia
